web_snippets: Charo Santos-Concio was born on October 27, 1955 in Legazpi City, Albay, Philippines. She is an actress and producer, known for Dirty Affair (1990)
Charo Santos-Concio is a Filipino actress, TV host, and former president of ABS-CBN Corporation from 2008 to 2015. She is known as the host of Maalaala Mo Kaya ...
